price: 14. Qofkiise ku caasiya Alle iyo Rasuulkiisa oo ka tallaaba xuduuddiisa, Wuxuu gelin Naar isagoo ku dhex waaraya weligi; wuxuuna leeyahay cadaab dulleysa.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَهُۥ يُدۡخِلۡهُ نَارًا خَٰلِدٗا فِيهَا وَلَهُۥ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿṣi al-laha warasūlahu wayataʿadda ḥudūdahu yud'khil'hu nāran khālidan fīhā walahu ʿadhābun muhīnun
